Name: Typed82
About the game: About Typed'82 A simple typing game to complement your keyboard and immerses you in an atmospheric typing experience. As you progress and improve your typing skills, the visuals and music set a pleasing environment. A variety of modes help you to improve in different areas of keyboard typing. All supported by statistics for every test and progress over time. Typing Tests Test your typing skill with a random set of words or in full sets of sentences. Practice Mode Practice your speed in finding random sets of letters. Battle Mode Kamikaze UFOs surround you. Hold them off! Ranked Mode This mode adds leaderboards to the table. Test yourself against other players worldwide in your language on weekly changing sets of tests.
Meta Title: Typed82: Feb 24, 2021, Beardman Studios and Full Overview
